title: Alert dashbord for Prometheus Alertmanager
author: prymitive
content: readme.md unseealert dashboard prometheus alertmanager.alertmanager ui is useful browsing alerts managing silences, it'slacking a dashboard tool - unsee aims fill gap.'s developed a dedicated tool it's intended provide read access alert data, therefore safe be accessed wider audience. get notifications new unsee releases can subscribe the rss feed github provides - https://github.com/cloudflare/unsee/releases.atom get email notifications please one the free services providingrss email notifications, blogtrottr.supported alertmanager versionsalertmanager's api isn't stable yet can change between releases.unsee currently supports alertmanager 0.4, 0.5 0.6.security unsee process doesn't send api request the alertmanager couldmodify alerts silence state, it does provide web interface allows user send such requests directly the alertmanager api. you wish deploy unsee a read- tool please ensure :the unsee process is able connect the alertmanager apiread- users are able connect the unsee web interfaceread- users are able connect the alertmanager apimetricsunsee process metrics are accessible under /metrics path default. you set web_prefix option path relative it beused.building runninginstalling using go commandunsee is installable, the easiest is run: install github.com/cloudflare/unsee unsee binary be installed $gopath/bin directory.note this build latest master version might work your alertmanager version. supported alertmanager versions.building source clone git repo build binary yourself run:git clone https://github.com/cloudflare/unsee $gopath/src/github.com/cloudflare/unseecd $gopath/src/github.com/cloudflare/unsee finally compile unsee binary run:runningunsee is configured via environment variables command line flags.environment variable alertmanager_uri cli flag -alertmanager.uri is only option required run. environment variablessection below the full list supported environment variables. examples:alertmanager_uri=https://alertmanager.example.com unseeunsee -alertmanager.uri https://alertmanager.example.com is make target will compile run unsee: run default will listen port 8080 alertmanager mock data beused, override alertmanager uri set alertmanager_uri /or port variables. example: port=5000 alertmanager_uri=https://alertmanager.example.com rundockerrunning pre-build docker imageofficial docker images are built hosted hub.docker.com.images are built automatically :release tags git - cloudflare/unsee:vx.y.zmaster branch commits - cloudflare/unsee:latestexamples start release image run:docker run -e alertmanager_uri=https://alertmanager.example.com cloudflare/unsee:vx.y.zlatest release details be found github. start docker image build lastet master branch run:docker run -e alertmanager_uri=https://alertmanager.example.com cloudflare/unsee:latestnote latest master branch might bugs breaking changes. usingrelease images is strongly recommended any production .building docker image docker-image will build docker image sources.running docker image run-docker run locally built docker image. same defaults override variablesapply with run. example: port=5000 alertmanager_uri=https://alertmanager.example.com run-dockerenvironment variablesalertmanager_timeouttimeout requests send alertmanager, accepts values time.duration format. examples: alertmanager_timeout=10s alertmanager_timeout=2m option also set using -alertmanager.timeout flag. example: $ unsee -alertmanager.timeout 2mdefault is 40s.alertmanager_ttlinterval refreshing alerts silences, tells unsee often pull data alertmanager, accepts values time.duration format. examples:alertmanager_ttl=30salertmanager_ttl=5m option also set using -alertmanager.ttl flag. example:$ unsee -alertmanager.ttl 5mdefault is 1m.note the maximum value this option is 15m. ui has watchdog tracks timestamp the last pull. the uidoes receive updates more 15 minutes will print error reload page.alertmanager_uriuri the alertmanager instance, unsee use to pull alert groups silences. endpoints use:${alertmanager_uri}/api/v1/alerts/groups${alertmanager_uri}/api/v1/silencessupported uri schemes:http://https://file://file:// scheme is useful testing purposes, 's used make runtarget.example:alertmanager_uri=https://alertmanager.example.com option also set using -alertmanager.uri flag. example:$ unsee -alertmanager.uri https://alertmanager.example.com variable is required there is default value.debug enable gin debug mode. willconfigure print more debugging information startup.examples:debug=truedebug=false option also set using -debug flag. example:$ unsee -debugdefault is false.color_labels_staticlist label names will have same color applied (different the default label color). allows quickly spot specific label can high range values, it's important reading dashboard. example coloring instance label allows quickly learn instanceis affected given alert. accepts space separated list label names.examples:color_labels_static=instancecolor_labels_static="instance cluster" option also set using -color.labels.static flag. example:$ unsee -color.labels.static "instance cluster" variable is optional default is set ( label have staticcolor).color_labels_uniquelist label names should unique colors generated the ui. colors help visually identify alerts shared labels, example coloringhostname label allow quickly spot alerts the same host.accepts space separated list label names. examples:color_labels_unique=hostnamecolor_labels_unique="cluster environment rack" option also set using -color.labels.unique flag. example:$ unsee -color.labels.unique "cluster environment rack" variable is optional default is set ( label have uniquecolor).filter_defaultdefault alert filter apply user loads unsee ui without filterspecified. accepts comma separated list filter expressions (visit /help page unsee details filters). examples:filter_default=level=criticalfilter_default="cluster=prod,instance=~prod" option also set using -filter.default flag. example:$ unsee -filter.default "cluster=prod,instance=~prod"default is set ( filter be applied).jira_regex allows define regex rules will applied silence comments.regex rules be used discover jira issue ids the comment text inject links those issues, instead rendering plain text.rule syntax:$(regex)@$(jira url)accepts space separated list rules. examples:jira_regex="devops-[0-9]+@https://jira.example.com" above match devops-123 text the silence comment string convert to https://jira.example.com/browse/devops-123 link. option also set using -jira.regex flag. example:$ unsee -jira.regex "devops-[0-9]+@https://jira.example.com" variable is optional default is set ( rule be applied).porthttp port listen . example:port=8000 option also set using -port flag. example:$ unsee -port 8000default is 8080.sentry_dsndsn sentry integration go. sentry documentation details. example:sentry_dsn=https://<key>:<secret>@sentry.io/<project> option also set using -sentry.dsn flag. example:$ unsee -sentry.dsn "https://<key>:<secret>@sentry.io/<project>" variable is optional default is set (sentry support is disabled go errors).sentry_public_dsndsn sentry integration javascript. sentry documentation details.example:sentry_public_dsn=https://<key>@sentry.io/<project> option also set using -sentry.public.dsn flag. example:$ unsee -sentry.public.dsn "https://<key>@sentry.io/<project>" variable is optional default is set (sentry support is disabled javascript errors).strip_labelslist label names should be shown the ui. allows hide labels are needed the alert dashboard. accepts space separated list label names. examples:strip_labels=exporter_typestrip_labels="prometheus_instance alert_type" option also set using -strip.labels flag. example:$ unsee -strip.labels "prometheus_instance alert_type" variable is optional default is set ( labels be shown).web_prefixurl root unsee, can to you wish serve from location than /. examples:web_prefix=/unsee/ will configure unsee serve requests http://localhost/unsee/instead http://localhost/. option also set using -web.prefix flag. example:$ unsee -web.prefix /unsee/default is /.contributingplease contributing details.licenseapache license
